trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> class that a type or property should use when it is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 标识类型或属性在序列化时应使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: For a type, you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> attribute at the type level.
trans-unit.target: 对于类型，您将应用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute>类型级别的属性。

trans-unit.source: For a property, you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> attribute at the property level.
trans-unit.target: 对于属性，您将应用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute>属性级别的属性。

trans-unit.source: Application at the property level potentially overrides any previous declaration for that property's type as applied at the type level.
trans-unit.target: 在类型级别应用，在属性级别的应用程序可能将该属性的类型的任何以前声明重写。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer> can be associated with an attachable member by applying the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> attribute on the static `get` accessor method for the attachable member.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>可以通过将应用与可附加成员相关联<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute>静态属性`get`可附加成员的访问器方法。

trans-unit.source: Value serialization is also applicable for enumerations, interfaces and structures, but not for delegates.
trans-unit.target: 值序列化也适用于枚举、 接口和结构，但不适用于委托。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The assembly qualified type name string for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> class to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> 类的程序集限定的类型名称字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute" /> class, using an assembly qualified type name string.
trans-unit.target: 使用程序集限定的类型名称字符串初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The assembly qualified type name string is the value of <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> for the requested <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 所在的程序集限定的类型名称字符串的值<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>请求<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: A type that represents the type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> 类的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute" /> class, using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定类型初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> class reported by this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取此特性报告的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> 类的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly qualified name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> type for this type or property.
trans-unit.target: 为此类型或属性获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> 类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: The assembly qualified name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的程序集限定名称。
